item.description:
We will be meeting in E51-376
Feature Talk: Selling Stocks In a CANSLIM-Based Investment Program by Kieran F. McDonough

Description: CANSLIM is a rules based system. Mr. McDonough will cover rules from Bill O'Neil's book, How to make money in stocks.
In particular:
- Avoid freezing at key decision-making points by using fact-based rules instead of emotions.
- Protect your portfolio using stock charts to spot red flags early.

Mr. McDonough is the President of McDonough Wealth Advisors, LLC, a Registered Principal with Raymond James Financial Services, Inc. He can be reached at www.canslimadvisor.com. Mr. McDonough also teaches Investors Business Daily's Level 1 and Level 2 workshops throughout the country.
The agenda for the meetup will be:
7:00 Fred Sears's Q&A, then the Market Report
8:00 Kieran McDonough's feature presentation (described above)
9:00 Break followed by Stock picks discussion

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required.
item.name: Boston IBD February Meetup
